titles.title: Preserving Integrity in Immigration Benefits Act
Preserving Integrity in Immigration Benefits Act
Preserving Integrity in Immigration Benefits Act
To direct the Director of U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services to conduct a review of certain approved immigration benefit requests, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 18 - 11.
